citations.narrative:
The corrugated metal panels along the front entrance to the shelter in the enclosure housing 6 donkeys is pulled away
from the boards in multiple areas leaving exposed nail heads. The metal panels are ripped, bent, and pulled upward with
sharp edges. The sharp edges and exposed nail heads present an injury hazard to the animals and these areas are not in
good repair.
To be corrected by: December 30, 2021
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the manager.
End Section

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The corrugated metal panels along the front entrance to the shelter in the enclosure housing 6 donkeys is pulled away 
from the boards in multiple areas leaving exposed nail heads. The metal panels are ripped, bent, and pulled upward with 
sharp edges. The sharp edges and exposed nail heads present an injury hazard to the animals and these areas are not in 
good repair. 
To be corrected by:  December 30, 2021 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the manager. 
 
End Section

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
